game.name: SUPREMACY: WORLD WAR 3
game.genres: Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: This Long Term Strategy Game lets you take control of the armed forces of your nation. Become responsible for its military expansion, technological research and economic development. Form alliances and wage total war for global dominance on the battlefields of World War 3.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This Long Term Strategy Game lets you take control of the armed forces of your nation. Become responsible for its military expansion, technological research and economic development. Form alliances and wage total war for global dominance on the battlefields of World War 3.

reviewHighlights.text: Do not even attempt to get invest into this game, and ill share few reasons why !! 1. This game is run by a very lazy and cheap devs who dont wanna wo...
It may say I only have 30 minutes but i played this game on mobile a lot. 4X games are the only real option if you dont want to spend months in a game...
